title: Israeli Army Reservists Are Suspected of Using Inside Knowledge to Bet
summary_full: The authorities said several reservists and a civilian were arrested, and two were charged, after an investigation into the use of classified information to bet on military operations.
summary_public: The authorities said several reservists and a civilian were arrested, and two were charged, after an investigation into the use of classified information to bet on military operations.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Suspected of Using Inside Knowledge to Bet
